nodes.text: The Zavian Abyss was a hazardous area of space in the Expansion Region of the galaxy. A maelstrom of electricity filled with asteroids, the Zavian Abyss contained numerous wrecked starships, including the wreckage of an old Venator-class Star Destroyer. After the Battle of Endor, Vanguard Squadron and the Starhawk ambushed the Overseer in the Zavian Abyss.
The Zavian Abyss was created for the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
